name: GPT-5.2-Codex
description: OpenAI's advanced agentic coding model specifically designed for professional software engineering and defensive cybersecurity, available as both a chat interface and CLI tool.
community_quotes: Most advanced agentic coding model for professional software engineering
Available to all paid ChatGPT users with API access coming soon

name: Gemini Deep Research Agent
description: Google's deepest AI research agent that can autonomously plan, execute, and synthesize multi-step research tasks, now available through Gemini API for developer integration.
community_quotes: Can save hours of research work through autonomous execution
First time developers can embed Google's Deep Research into their applications

name: Mistral Vibe CLI
description: Open-source terminal-first AI coding agent by Mistral AI that understands entire codebases and provides interactive chat interface for natural language coding assistance.
community_quotes: Minimal CLI coding agent that surfs vibe-coding tailwinds
Open-source alternative to proprietary AI coding assistants
